com.adidas.connectcore.user

Interface UserRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidUserRepository

    public interface UserRepository
    This is the interface that models a User Repository.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<User> all()
      Method that will return a list with all the Users stored in the repository.
      void clean()
      Method that will clean the repository.
      void clearActiveUser()
      Method used to clean the current active user for the app.
      boolean delete(User user)
      Method used for delete a user for the repository.
      User getActiveUser()
      Method to get the app active user.
      java.lang.String getExtraDataForUser(User user, java.lang.String key)
      Method to get data for a user.
      void putExtraDataForUser(User user, java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value)
      Method to store a extra data for a user.
      void save(User user)
      Method used for save a user in the repository.
      void setActiveUser(User user)
      The Active user is the user that rigth now is the main used for the app.

        Method used for delete a user for the repository.

        user -

      • setActiveUser

        void setActiveUser(User user)
        The Active user is the user that rigth now is the main used for the app. This method will mark the user passed as parameter as the active one.
        Parameters:
        user - The active user for the current app.

      • getActiveUser

        User getActiveUser()
        Method to get the app active user.
        Returns:
        The active user for the app.

      • clearActiveUser

        void clearActiveUser()
        Method used to clean the current active user for the app.

      • putExtraDataForUser

        void putExtraDataForUser(User user,
                         java.lang.String key,
                         java.lang.String value)
        Method to store a extra data for a user. Based on key value.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to save the data.
        key - The key used to save the data.
        value - Value assigned to the key.

      • getExtraDataForUser

        java.lang.String getExtraDataForUser(User user,
                                     java.lang.String key)
        Method to get data for a user.
        Parameters:
        user - The user who has the data.
        key - Key associated with the value.
        Returns:
        String containing the value associated to the key pass as parameter.
